content: Spotted a typo on http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/r2/StructureDefinition-argo-ethnicity.html "Argonuat" - Can't raise a ticket at the moment.

fixed see this Current Build - there were some tooling issues with the extensions which are fixed as well as the typos. http://build.fhir.org/ig/Healthedata1/Argo-DSTU2/StructureDefinition-argo-ethnicity.html. Should be published within a few days

Stumbled over a typo-of-kind: the link on http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/r2/index.html under "Security" Â» "SMART on FHIR Authorization Guide" is dead, it should probably be http://docs.smarthealthit.org/authorization/ (unless the argonaut-dev branch is still hosted somewhere on smarthealthit.org).
thanks will add to the issues to update for next set of errata
